TopicTitle: I can't get astronomers visual pack to work in my ksp install. Its getting irritating

Articles.Content: Hello, Ive been trying to get a heavily modded install of ksp to work with astronomers visual pack. Ive had this install for a few months now, recently added principia. I Followed an installation guide for AVP (Without CKAN beacause i use mac). I installed it correctly but when i opened a save, only the atmosphere opacities had changed. i tried searching other methods, they all ended in the same result. i then swapped AVP for EVE's default configs (BoulderCo.) and it worked seamlessly. i Then swapped it back and it didnt work, tried using methods from reddit posts but none of them worked. Ive been  looking everywhere so i decided to  post here so someone more experienced can help
Ive since also re emptied my GameData, and it did not work
